verbose_text: In the present study, our data indicated that : i) AOPPs induced NADPH oxidase dependent ROS production in IMECs; ii) NADPH oxidase activity was significantly enhanced in AOPP exposed IMECs; iii) the expression levels of p47 phox and p22 phox, the essential subunits of NADPH oxidase in IMECs, were significantly upregulated following exposure to AOPPs.
